actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to increase the number of weeks of unemployment benefits under the emergency unemployment compensation program.

summary.text: Extends from March 31,1977, until September 30, 1977, the period within which unemployment benefits under the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act shall be provided.

titles.title: A bill to increase the number of weeks of unemployment benefits under the emergency unemployment compensation program.
